30 points of damage

It flees across its complex web to a secret lair where it heals.

An opposed STR roll versus the web's STR 150

1/1D10 Sanity points

+6D6, but only 1D6 per pseudopod

What is the number of attacks Abhoth can make per round?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if Abhoth is reduced to 0 hit points?
Abhoth withdraws and sinks far away down into the earth
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Abhoth's armor against kinetic damage?
20 points per combat round
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Abhoth's fighting attacks percentage?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much damage does Abhoth regenerate from at the rate of 20 points per combat round?
All kinetic damage
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What will cause normal damage to Abhoth?
Fire or magic
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to Abhoth if it is reduced to 0 hit points?
It withdraws and sinks far away down into the earth

Does Abhoth require any spells to function?
No, it may have some effect from spells
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does Abhoth do after healing from its injuries?
It oozes toward the surface
